title: Step 7 - Post-Sharing Assurance & Review
summary: Provide continuous monitoring and assurance after sharing synthetic data to detect and respond to any policy breaches or privacy incidents.
checklist: Establish ongoing monitoring processes for data use and access.
Review audit logs regularly for suspicious activity.
Respond to any incidents or breaches according to organizational policy.
Conduct periodic reviews of data sharing arrangements.
Confirm retention and destruction policies are followed.

decisions.question: Has any policy breach or privacy incident been detected?

governance_intent: Provide continuous monitoring and assurance after sharing.
